document_data.name: Deep Hunting Grounds
document_data.mainbody: The '''Deep Hunting Grounds''' was a temple dedicated to [[Malar]], the Beastlord.
document_data.Location: The temple was located within [[Undermountain]] beneath [[Mount Waterdeep]] in a subterranean forest called [[Wyllowwood]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Arbenita Darkwind]] led a congregation of sixty [[priest]]s, [[warrior]]s, and [[rogue]]s who worshiped Malar.
document_data.Activities: Though most hunts took place within Undermountain, Malar's faithful often spilled onto the streets of [[Waterdeep]] above ground with increasing frequency.
